sentences.en: Altman strips away the pretence and mythology to expose the film industry as a business like any other.
sentences.cn: 奥尔特曼揭去了电影产业的伪装和神秘光环，暴露了其与其他产业并无二致的商业本质。

sentences.en: He is the hero of Greek mythology.
sentences.cn: 他是希腊民间传说中的英雄.

sentences.en: He studies Greek and Roman mythology.
sentences.cn: 他研究希腊和罗马神话.

sentences.en: His novels are a rich synthesis of Balkan history and mythology.
sentences.cn: 他的小说融合了大量巴尔干半岛的历史和神话故事。

sentences.en: I find the whole mythology surrounding superheroes fascinating.
sentences.cn: 我对那些英雄式的神话非常着迷.

sentences.en: In Egyptian mythology, the goddess Isis was the universal mother goddess.
sentences.cn: 在埃及神话中, 女神伊希斯是世界之母.

sentences.en: In Greek mythology, the god Zeus took the form of a swan to seduce Leda.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神话里，主神宙斯化作天鹅引诱了勒达。

sentences.en: In Greek mythology, Zeus was the ruler of Gods and men.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神话中, 宙斯是众神和人类的统治者.

sentences.en: In Norse mythology the moon is personified as male.
sentences.cn: 在斯堪的纳维亚神话里，月亮被赋予了男性身份。

sentences.en: It is a testament to the power of political mythology.
sentences.cn: 这说明,编造政治神话可以产生多大的威力.

sentences.en: Small wonder that Greek mythology is extinct.
sentences.cn: 希腊神话现在给人淡忘了,这并不足为奇.

sentences.en: The flexibility and looseness of the materials from which mythology is made.
sentences.cn: 神话的取材往往随意灵活.

sentences.en: The most basic facts about him are lost in a fog of mythology.
sentences.cn: 关于他的那些最基本信息离奇地湮没无踪了。

sentences.en: There are thousands of love stories in Greek Mythology.
sentences.cn: 希腊神话中有许多爱情故事.

sentences.en: They are all alike founded on fables and mythology.
sentences.cn: 他们都是建立在神秘传说之上.
